attributes.additional_details: NHS whistleblowers are not being listened to. There has been whistlblowing  about the deaths and poor results  keough rewview at grimsby hospital. managers are just covering up all the fraud and scandal by using public money to  pay private legal firms to do it? why is the money not going to patient care. they don't even take care of staff properly, how can they take care of pateints? invetigate properly and get the poeple who can working honestly  back to work!
